quotes: In 1983 he was honored as Air Conservationist of the Year by the Tennessee Conservation League for his role in TVA's air quality and acid rain efforts.
In 1990 he was elected to membership in the Third World Academy of Sciences.
and received the 1992 Egyptian-American Outstanding Achievement Award.
